00040 //----------------------------------------------------------
00041 GrKFInterpolator::GrKFInterpolator( URef< GrKFAnimData > kfData )
00042 : _kfData( kfData )
00043 , _curRotKFIdx( 0 )
00044 , _curScaleKFIdx( 0 )
00045 , _curTranslateKFIdx( 0 )
00046 , _dataFlags( 0 )
00047 , _output( 0 )
00048 , _outputXFormIdx( 0 )
00049 , _duration( kfData->GetDuration() )
00050 {
00051         B_ASSERT( kfData != 0 );
00052         _dataFlags |= ( kfData->GetRotKFCount() > 0 ) ? kHasRotKFs : 0;
00053         _dataFlags |= ( kfData->GetScaleKFCount() > 0 ) ? kHasScaleKFs : 0;
00054         _dataFlags |= ( kfData->GetTranslateKFCount() > 0 ) ? kHasTranslateKFs : 0;
00055 }

00068 //----------------------------------------------------------
00069 void
00070 GrKFInterpolator::Init( URef< GrKFAnimData > kfData )
00071 {
00072         B_ASSERT( kfData != 0 );
00073 
00074         _kfData = kfData;
00075         _curRotKFIdx = 0;
00076         _curScaleKFIdx = 0;
00077         _curTranslateKFIdx = 0;
00078         _dataFlags = 0;
00079         _output = 0;
00080         _outputXFormIdx = 0;
00081         _duration = kfData->GetDuration();
00082 
00083         _dataFlags |= ( kfData->GetRotKFCount() > 0 ) ? kHasRotKFs : 0;
00084         _dataFlags |= ( kfData->GetScaleKFCount() > 0 ) ? kHasScaleKFs : 0;
00085         _dataFlags |= ( kfData->GetTranslateKFCount() > 0 ) ? kHasTranslateKFs : 0;
00086 }

00088 //----------------------------------------------------------
00089 URef< GrKFAnimData >
00090 GrKFInterpolator::GetKFData() const
00091 {
00092         return _kfData;
00093 }

00095 //----------------------------------------------------------
00096 bool
00097 GrKFInterpolator::SetOutput( GrAnimXFormCache* output )
00098 {
00099         _output = output;
00100         if ( _output )
00101         {
00104                 _outputXFormIdx = _output->GetXFormIdx( _kfData->GetTargetName() );
00105                 if ( _outputXFormIdx == ~0 )
00106                 {
00107                         _output = 0;
00108                         return false;
00109                 }
00110         }
00111 
00113         return true;
00114 }

00116 //----------------------------------------------------------
00117 void
00118 GrKFInterpolator::ApplyPose( float time, float blendWeight, float clampDuration, bool clamp )
00119 {
00121         if ( _output == 0 )
00122                 return;
00123 
00124         if ( time > _duration )
00125         {
00128                 if ( clamp || time < clampDuration )
00129                         time = _duration;
00130                 else
00131                         time = Fract( time / _duration ) * _duration;
00132         }
00133 
00134         static const MVec3 kOne( 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f );
00135         MQuat rotate;
00136         MVec3 translate( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f );
00137         MVec3 scale( 1.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f );
00138 
00140         unsigned int fixedTime = ( unsigned int )( time * 1024.0f );
00141         if ( _dataFlags & kHasRotKFs )
00142         {
00144                 const GrKFAnimData::SRotKeyFrame* curRotKF = 0;
00145                 const GrKFAnimData::SRotKeyFrame* nextRotKF = 0;
00146                 FindKeyFrame( curRotKF, nextRotKF, _curRotKFIdx, _kfData->GetRotKFArray(), fixedTime );
00147 
00149                 float t = CalcT( fixedTime, curRotKF->time, nextRotKF->time );
00150                 rotate = curRotKF->rotate.SlerpTo( nextRotKF->rotate, t );
00151                 rotate = rotate;
00152         }
00153 
00154         if ( _dataFlags & kHasScaleKFs )
00155         {
00157                 const GrKFAnimData::SScaleKeyFrame* curScaleKF = 0;
00158                 const GrKFAnimData::SScaleKeyFrame* nextScaleKF = 0;
00159                 FindKeyFrame( curScaleKF, nextScaleKF, _curScaleKFIdx, _kfData->GetScaleKFArray(), fixedTime );
00160 
00162                 float t = CalcT( fixedTime, curScaleKF->time, nextScaleKF->time );
00163                 scale = Lerp( curScaleKF->scaleXYZ, nextScaleKF->scaleXYZ, t );
00164 //              scale = Bezier3( curScaleKF->scaleXYZ, curScaleKF->outTan, nextScaleKF->inTan, nextScaleKF->scaleXYZ, t );
00165         }
00166 
00167         if ( _dataFlags & kHasTranslateKFs )
00168         {
00170                 const GrKFAnimData::STranslateKeyFrame* curTranslateKF = 0;
00171                 const GrKFAnimData::STranslateKeyFrame* nextTranslateKF = 0;
00172                 FindKeyFrame( curTranslateKF, nextTranslateKF, _curTranslateKFIdx, _kfData->GetTranslateKFArray(), fixedTime );
00173 
00175                 float t = CalcT( fixedTime, curTranslateKF->time, nextTranslateKF->time );
00176                 translate = Lerp( curTranslateKF->translate, nextTranslateKF->translate, t );
00177 //              translate = Bezier3( curTranslateKF->translate, curTranslateKF->outTan, nextTranslateKF->inTan, nextTranslateKF->translate, t );
00178         }
00179 
00181         rotate.BlendFromIdentFast( blendWeight );
00182         translate *= blendWeight;
00183         scale = blendWeight * ( scale - kOne );
00184         _output->AccumXForm( _outputXFormIdx, GrAnimXForm( rotate, translate, scale ) );
00185 }

00188 //==========================================================
00190 //==========================================================
00191 
00192 //----------------------------------------------------------
00193 float
00194 GrKFInterpolator::CalcT( unsigned int fixedTime, unsigned int curKFTime, unsigned int nextKFTime )
00195 {
00197         unsigned int range = nextKFTime - curKFTime;
00198 
00202         B_ASSERT( range < (1<<22) );
00203 
00206         unsigned int tFixed = ( ( fixedTime - curKFTime ) << 10 ) / range;
00207         float t = float( tFixed ) / 1024.0f;
00208 
00210         return t;
00211 }
